items.title: WATCH:  House swept away by rushing floodwaters in New Mexico

items.title: First the rain, then the flood: How Camp Mystic campers woke to devastation on July 4
items.description: "And our cabins are high up, and for them to be flooding, it's like, you know, something's wrong," Georgia Jones said.

items.title: 3 dead, including 2 children, in New Mexico flooding, local authorities say
items.description: The Village of Ruidoso said three people died in "historic" flash flooding.
